gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.rules
Class RuleEngine

java.lang.Object
  gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.rules.RuleEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionHandler, java.lang.Runnable
public class RuleEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionHandler, java.lang.Runnable

This is the rule engine implementation. This is a singleton object.

public AggregationPool pool(java.util.UUID pool,
                            int order,
                            com.google.common.base.Function<Event,java.lang.Boolean> action,
                            int maxCount,
                            long timeWindow,
                            CheckedField... fields)
Description copied from interface: ActionHandler
ensure the existence of the specified pool and create it if it doesn't exist.

Specified by:
pool in interface ActionHandler
Parameters:
pool - the pool ID.
order - the pool order in the rule.
action - event handling action.
maxCount - the maximum event count in a group.
timeWindow - the maximum time difference between the most recent and the oldest event in the group.
fields - the aggregation key fields. All events in a group have the same values in those.
Returns:
the pool.
